Aldeburgh Library

Manager: Emma Stanley

Victoria Road, Aldeburgh
IP15 5EG

Tel: 01728 452502
Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
Friends group: Aldeburgh Library Foundation
Social media: Facebook

Facilities

  • Free wifi available
  • Scanning, printing and photocopying facilities
  • Accessibility information
Room hire

Display space

Two cork boards in the foyer: displays adverts for anyone selling items.

Thursday 0900 – 1300

Sunday 1000 – 1230, 1300 – 1530

Event Days Times
